sentences.en: a campaign to promote adult literacy
sentences.cn: 提高成人文化水平的运动
新一轮成人识字[扫盲]运动

sentences.en: Educational development is measured as a combination of attainment - adult literacy - and opportunity - enrolment.
sentences.cn: 衡量教育的发展则要结合成就(成人识字率)与机会(入学率).

sentences.en: Grinding poverty results in a very low level of literacy.
sentences.cn: 贫穷的煎熬使得海地国民中的识字水平极低.

sentences.en: I can't believe that he failed the literacy test.
sentences.cn: 我无法相信他识字测试不及格.

sentences.en: Increased literacy, administrative efficiency, and ease of communication are laudable goals.
sentences.cn: 提高认字人数, 行政效率, 和交流方便都是值得赞赏的目标.

sentences.en: Is Core Science successful in improving students'general scientific literacy?
sentences.cn: 核心科学在提高学生普遍科学素质方面是否取得成功?

sentences.en: Literacy may not be an inalienable human right.
sentences.cn: 能读写可能算不得是一项不可剥夺的人权.

sentences.en: Many adults have some problems with literacy and numeracy.
sentences.cn: 很多成年人在读写和计算方面都有困难。

sentences.en: Of course, literacy isn't the same thing as intelligence.
sentences.cn: 当然，识字和智力是两码事。

sentences.en: Political selection is more dependent on sophistry and less on economic literacy.
sentences.cn: 政治选举更多地取决于诡辩的能力，而不在于是否懂经济。

sentences.en: She worked zealously to raise funds for the literacy project.
sentences.cn: 她工作热情,为扫盲工程募集资金.

sentences.en: Six months later John had developed literacy and numeracy skills, plus confidence.
sentences.cn: 6个月后，约翰已经渐渐能够识字和算数，也有了自信。

sentences.en: The literacy rate there is the highest in Central America.
sentences.cn: 那里的识字率居中美洲之首。

sentences.en: The workplace plays a central role in promoting functional literacy and numeracy.
sentences.cn: 职场在推广功能性识字和数理能力中扮演著重要角色.

sentences.en: This would reduce the demand for education beyond literacy.
sentences.cn: 这将缩减超出读写要求之外的教育需求.
